articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: YouTube relaxes monetization guidelines for some controversial topics - TechCrunch
articles.description: These controversial topics include self-harm, abortion, suicide, and domestic and sexual abuse.
articles.content: YouTube is updating its advertiser-friendly content guidelines to allow more videos on controversial issues to earn full ad revenue, as long as they’re dramatized or discussed in a non-graphic manner… [+2428 chars]
